meanings.sent1: The small bug went unnoticed on the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The unnoticed cat quietly watched the birds outside.
meanings.sent3: The unnoticed squirrel stole the nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The unnoticed treasure lay hidden beneath the old tree.
meanings.sent5: The unnoticed spider spun its web in the dark corner.

meanings.sent1: She slipped unnoticed into the room.
meanings.sent2: The thief moved unnoticed through the crowded market.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone unnoticed in the bright city lights.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered through the trees unnoticed by most.

meanings.sent1: The unnoticed changes in the painting were revealed under UV light.
meanings.sent2: The unnoticed details in the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent3: The unnoticed scent of flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent4: The unnoticed danger lurked in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The unnoticed beauty of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
